document.full_text: the los angeles dodgers capitalized on san francisco's error-strewn performance to hand last season's world series champions a 2-1 defeat on major league baseball's opening day.
document.title: la dodgers capitalize on giants' opening day errors
lines_and_colors: the los angeles dodgers capitalized on san francisco's error-strewn performance to hand last season's world series champions a 2-1 defeat on major league baseball's opening day.
